hero.title: Juats
hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer with a degree in Computer Science from the Federal University of Pelotas. I create beautiful, performant, and accessible experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer with a degree in Computer Science from the Federal University of Pelotas, with over two years of experience creating and improving high-impact solutions.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.description1: I worked on large-scale projects, such as Smart NX, a platform with over 10,000 users, where I was the technical lead for the front-end of the application. My main contribution was in the customer service screen, handling a flow of over 4,000,000 monthly chats, of which 85% are resolved by bots, ensuring high performance and usability.
journey.description2: My experience includes distributed systems, microservices, microfrontends, and AWS infrastructure, always focusing on observability, testing, and scalability. On a daily basis, I work with technologies like React, React Native, Next.js, Nest.js, Prisma, PostgreSQL, and many others.
journey.description3: I am passionate about solving problems and optimizing processes, always seeking to deliver efficient, secure, and innovative solutions. For me, software development goes beyond code: it's about ensuring that each system operates with fluidity, reliability, and high performance, driving business growth and creating experiences for users.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of my recent projects that showcase my skills and passion for creating exceptional experiences.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: I'm always interested in hearing about new opportunities and exciting projects. Let's work together to create something amazing!

info.title: Let's Connect
info.description: I'm currently available for freelance work and exciting opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!

footer.description: Full-Stack Developer with a degree in Computer Science from the Federal University of Pelotas
